Alex Keyes

Software Engineer & open source fan.

I'm currently the lead software engineer at Bayesquare.

I love interacting with new people, languages and frameworks. Software has the power to make people more productive and happier. That's what I'm all about.

Right now I'm particularly interested in the intersection of programming and finance. This means my focus is on Machine Learning and Statistics, manipulating data-sets with Python. I also love web development, with most of my time spent writing HTML, CSS, Javascript and PHP.

If you're interested in learning more about my work, check out my projects page to see what I've worked on and what I'm doing right now.
